attribute.name: mpiCommand
attribute.description: Optional MPI command to run job.

attribute.name: LL_BLOCKING
attribute.description: Specify blocking factor for assigning tasks to nodes.

attribute.name: LL_COMMENT
attribute.description: Describe characteristics or distinguishing features of job.

attribute.name: LL_ENVIRONMENT
attribute.description: Specify handling of job's environment variables by LoadLeveler.

attribute.name: LL_HARD_LIMIT
attribute.description: Specify the hard elaspsed time limit for this job.

attribute.name: LL_JOB_CLASS
attribute.description: Specify the job class to use.

attribute.name: LL_JOB_NAME
attribute.description: Specify the name of the job.

attribute.name: LL_JOB_TYPE
attribute.description: Specify the type of the job.

attribute.name: LL_LARGE_PAGE
attribute.description: Specify if a job requires large page support (AIX).

attribute.name: LL_NODES
attribute.description: Specify number of nodes.

attribute.name: LL_NETWORK_LAPI
attribute.description: Specify network adapters and characteristics for LAPI applications.

attribute.name: LL_NETWORK_MPI
attribute.description: Specify network adapters and characteristics for MPI applications.

attribute.name: LL_NETWORK_MPI_LAPI
attribute.description: Specify network adapters and characteristics for MPI/LAPI applications.

attribute.name: LL_REQUIREMENTS
attribute.description: Specify requirements a node must meet to run a job.

attribute.name: LL_RESOURCES
attribute.description: Specify quantity of consumable resources used by each task.

attribute.name: LL_SHELL
attribute.description: Specify the name of a shell to use for this job.

attribute.name: LL_SOFT_LIMIT
attribute.description: Specify the soft elaspsed time limit for this job.

attribute.name: LL_STDIN
attribute.description: Specify a file to use for stdin input.

attribute.name: LL_STDERR
attribute.description: Specify a file to use for stderr output.

attribute.name: LL_STDOUT
attribute.description: Specify a file to use for stdout output.

attribute.name: LL_TASK_GEOMETRY
attribute.description: Specify grouping of parallel tasks on nodes.

attribute.name: LL_TASKS_PER_NODE
attribute.description: Specify number of tasks per node.

attribute.name: LL_TOTAL_TASKS
attribute.description: Specify total number of tasks.

attribute.name: LL_WALL_CLOCK_LIMIT
attribute.description: Specify the elapsed time the job can run (hardlimit,softlimit).

attribute.name: LL_NOTIFICATION
attribute.description: Specifies when mail is sent to the adress in the notify_user keyword.

attribute.name: LL_NOTIFICATION_EMAIL
attribute.description: Specifies the address to which mail is sent based on the notification keyword.
